entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
